DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether certain intravitreal injection techniques cause less pain than others and would therefore be beneficial for the patient's well being.
DOC.brief_title: Different Intravitreal Injection Techniques and Pain Level
DOC.criteria: Patients receiving intravitreal anti vascular endothelial growth factor (VEGF) injections Informed consent Dementia or any other reason for cognitive deterioration Technical limitations not allowing injecting by the protocol
